statements: SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE permission_level > 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE permission_level = 2 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE permission_level > 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT username FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, permission_level, username FROM user_accounts ORDER BY permission_level ASC, username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003) AND permission_level < 5;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_level > 5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM permissions WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT username, password FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM permissions WHERE permission_level > 5 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_accounts.username, permissions.permission_type FROM user_accounts INNER JOIN permissions ON user_accounts.user_id = permissions.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(permission_id) AS num_permissions FROM permissions GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_permissions > 2;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email IS NOT NULL
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions
SELECT * FROM home_automation_systems WHERE location='Living Room'
SELECT user_id, permission_id FROM user_permissions
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT system_id, system_name, location FROM home_automation_systems ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name, up.permission_id FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'jane_doe';
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT user_id, role_id, permission_id FROM user_role_permissions WHERE role_id = '1234' AND permission_id = '5678';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC, role_id ASC;
